topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Viewing Your Network

body.p: The Network Topology screen is a physical representation of your network configuration.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.

Based on whether you are working on a project or the domain:
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Networks tab.
Click the Project dashboard, then the Network panel.

Click the Network Topology tab.
Your network looks similar to the following diagram.

body.p: A router (here, labeled Router 1) is attached to the external network (labeled Ext-Net). A Network1 is attached to the router.
